ARABIC: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُۨجِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We responded to him and rescued him from his grief. That is how We rescue the muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We heard his cry, and saved him from the anguish. That is how We deliver those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon We accepted his prayer, and rescued him from grief. Thus do We rescue the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We answered his prayer and saved him from his grief. Thus We save the faithful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore heard his prayer and rescued him from grief; and similarly We shall rescue the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So We answered his call, and delivered him from the distress. And thus We do deliver the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We responded to him and delivered him from the grief and thus do We deliver the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We answered him, and delivered him out of grief; even so do, We deliver the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then we heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish. Thus we save believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We heard his prayer and delivered him from sorrow. Thus shall We deliver the true believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So We answered him, and We delivered him from the distress, and Thus do We deliver the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We answered his prayer and delivered him from the agony; and thus do We deliver the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We listened to him: and delivered him from distress: and thus do We deliver those who have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We answered his call, and delivered him from the distress. And thus We do deliver the believers (who believe in the Oneness of Allah, abstain from evil and work righteousness).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We heard his prayer and saved him from grief. As such We shall save the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We answered him, and saved him from the affliction. Thus We save the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:88] So We responded to him and delivered him from the distress, by [means of] those words, and thus, in the same way that We delivered him, We deliver the believers, from their anguish when they call out to Us seeking succour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish) and We saved him from the pit of darkness. (Thus We save believers) when they call upon Us. 359
